author: stefan2
msg: Get rid of the redundant INFO_PREFIX element.  We now have the full
(PREFIX_TAIL_LEN): This is now only needed when debugging the cache.

author: stefan2

author: stefan2
msg: Actually construct, store and compare the full key.  The code now has
(full_key_t): Add a buffer for the full key.
(find_entry): Compare the full key to ensure we've got an actual hit.
membuffer_cache_set_partial_internal): Store the full key in front
(combine_key): Combine the KEY with the prefix to form the full key.
